aboutPage.who2: the team has grown, and everyone is wondering what will be the next project of most watched portfolio in Brazil.
aboutPage.howWeWork: Organization, study and testing here are law. And the grace of each project is:
aboutPage.list1: 1. Enjoy the nostalgia of the sketches.
aboutPage.list2: 2. Admire the complexity of the processes.
aboutPage.list3: 3. Find yourself at the end of everything.
aboutPage.poemLine3: Se viu perdido em muitas ideias,
aboutPage.poemLine4: que a tal folha quase rasgou.
aboutPage.request: Do you need a website or web system? Request a quote.
